CCDD

Class CcddClassesDataTable.TableDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • CCDD.CcddClassesDataTable.TableDefinition
  • Enclosing class:
    CcddClassesDataTable

    protected static class CcddClassesDataTable.TableDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
    Table definition class. Contains the information necessary to construct a data table from information derived from a CSV, EDS, JSON, or XTCE import file

      • isPathFormatValid

        protected static boolean isPathFormatValid(java.lang.String tablePath)
        Check if the table name/path is in the expected format. Macros aren't expanded; the delimiters are simply removed
        Parameters:
        tablePath - table path in the format rootName<,childStructure.childName<,...>>
        Returns:
        true if the table name/path is not in the expected format
